translation: Arjuna said, "But what compels man to commit sin, even against his wishes, O Varshneya (Krishna), as if constrained by force?"
commentary: 3.36 Then now? Ken by which? Used impelled? This is this? Papam sin? Charati does? The man: man? unwilling not wishing? Even even? Varshneya O Varshneya? forced by force? Like as it were? employed constrained.Commentary Varshneya is one born in the family of the Vrishnis? a name of Krishna.
